Body.Content:
The new Copilot for Microsoft 365 app has already rolled out and available in the Teams Apps for Copilot licensed users. This update will bring the Copilot app into the Teams Chat list for easy discovery and access.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID: 192177

When this will happen:

This update will roll out to our commercial tenants in early February 2024 and expect to compete by late February 2024.

How this will affect your organization:

All users with the Copilot license and using the new Teams app will see the Copilot app at the top of their Chat list for easy discovery and access.

What you need to do to prepare:

You may need to notify your users about this change and let them know this is the latest Copilot app. They can continue to use it as before.

Title: Copilot for Microsoft 365 in Teams Chat list
